title: Successful login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully using valid username and password corresponding to a registered user with appropriate role.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify user is redirected to the dashboard.
Check that authentication token is set and session is active.

title: Login failure with incorrect credentials
description: Verify that login fails and an error message is shown when user enters invalid username or password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username/email or password.
Click the login button.
Check that login is denied.
Ensure appropriate error message is displayed.

title: Role-based access control enforcement
description: Verify users with different roles can access only authorized features and endpoints according to role permissions.

steps.description: Log in as a user with limited permissions (e.g. finance role).
Attempt to access admin-only pages such as Package Management or Company Settings.
Verify access is denied and redirection or error is shown.
Access pages and API endpoints allowed for the current role.
Verify data and UI components render correctly without errors.

title: Jamaah registration with valid data
description: Verify the complete jamaah (pilgrim) registration flow including form validation, package assignment, and payment status initialization with valid inputs.

steps.description: Navigate to Jamaah registration form.
Fill in all required personal details with valid values.
Select a travel package with available seats.
Upload required documents.
Submit the registration form.
Verify that jamaah is successfully created in the system.
Check package seat count is decremented accordingly.
Confirm payment status is initialized correctly.

title: Jamaah registration form validation error handling
description: Verify the registration form performs frontend and backend validation and displays appropriate error messages when invalid or incomplete data is submitted.

steps.description: Navigate to Jamaah registration form.
Leave required fields empty or enter invalid formats (e.g. wrong email or NPWP format).
Submit the registration form.
Verify that frontend validations trigger and prevent submission.
Force submitting invalid data via backend API if possible.
Ensure backend validation rejects data with error messages.

title: Package management CRUD operations
description: Verify Admin or Owner can create, read, update, and delete travel packages with correct data validation and seat/room management.

steps.description: Navigate to Package Management page.
Create a new package with valid details including unique package code, pricing, capacity, and schedule.
Confirm package is stored and listed.
Edit the package with updated pricing or schedule.
Verify updates are saved and reflected.
Delete an existing package without associated active jamaah entries.
Confirm package is removed from the list.
Try to create package with duplicated code.
Verify that validation error is raised preventing duplicate.

title: Income transaction recording and status update
description: Verify that finance role users can record income transactions (DP, installments, pelunasan) for jamaah and that payment status updates correctly and dashboard metrics refresh.

steps.description: Navigate to Income Management page.
Add a new income transaction specifying jamaah, payment type, amount, payment method, and date.
Verify transaction is saved and visible in list.
Confirm jamaah payment status updates accordingly.
Check that dashboard financial metrics reflect the new transaction.

title: Expense transaction recording with category validation
description: Verify finance role users can add expense records with proper categorization and validate amounts and required fields.

steps.description: Navigate to Expense Management page.
Add a new expense with valid category, amount, date, and bank details.
Confirm expense is recorded and listed correctly.
Attempt to add expense without required fields or invalid amounts.
Verify validation messages prevent incomplete or invalid submissions.

title: Vendor debt creation and payment recording
description: Verify that finance users can create vendor debts, record debt payments, and that payment history and status are updated accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to Vendor Debt Management page.
Create a new vendor debt with vendor selection, debt amount, due date, and category.
Verify debt record is created and listed.
Record a partial payment towards the vendor debt.
Confirm payment is tracked in payment history.
Verify debt status updates (e.g., partial, fully paid) correctly.

title: Comprehensive financial report generation and export
description: Verify users can generate financial reports (profit & loss, budget vs actual, invoices, audit logs) with filter options and export functionality.

steps.description: Navigate to the reports section.
Select report type and apply various filter criteria (date ranges, categories, vendors, jamaah).
Generate the report and view it in the UI.
Verify that the report data matches the filters and is accurate based on transactions.
Export the report to common formats (PDF, Excel).
Confirm the exported file is generated correctly and includes all report data.

title: User profile viewing and editing
description: Verify users can view and edit their profile information and that changes are updated correctly after validation.

steps.description: Navigate to user profile page.
Verify existing user data is displayed.
Edit fields such as name, email, and contact information.
Submit the form.
Confirm profile updates are saved and displayed.
Attempt invalid inputs and verify validation prevents submissions.

title: Company settings configuration and validation
description: Verify authorized users can update company information and configurations with validation and settings persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to the Company Settings page.
Update fields such as company name, NPWP tax ID, address, and currency settings.
Submit the changes.
Verify that changes are saved correctly and reload with updated data.
Enter invalid formats (e.g., incorrect NPWP) and check validation prevents saving.

title: Dashboard displays real-time financial and operational metrics
description: Verify that the dashboard page correctly loads and displays updated financial data, charts, and key statistics in accordance with backend data.

steps.description: Log in as authorized user and navigate to the dashboard.
Verify summary financial metrics are displayed accurately.
Check that charts (cash flow, income vs expense) load correctly with proper labels.
Simulate new financial transactions and verify dashboard updates in real-time.

title: Notifications delivery and display
description: Verify that payment reminders and system alerts are generated, sent to users, and displayed correctly in the notifications interface.

steps.description: Trigger payment reminder notifications by setting a jamaah payment nearing due date.
Log in as the target user and navigate to notifications page.
Verify notification is listed with correct content and timestamp.
Click notification to acknowledge or navigate to relevant section.
Confirm notification behaves as expected.

title: Global search functionality accuracy
description: Verify that the global search feature can perform queries across multiple entities like jamaah, packages, vendors and returns relevant results quickly.

steps.description: Open the global search modal.
Enter partial and full search terms that match different entities.
Verify search results include matching jamaah, packages, vendors, etc.
Check relevance order and result accuracy.
Perform empty or invalid searches and verify no errors occur and no irrelevant data is shown.

title: Security test: session management and token encryption
description: Verify that sessions and authentication tokens are securely managed using encryption and expire appropriately, protecting against unauthorized access.

steps.description: Log in with valid user and capture authentication token.
Ensure token is encrypted and stored securely in browser storage.
Attempt to access protected API endpoints with invalid or expired tokens.
Verify access is denied with authorization error.
Simulate session timeout and verify user is logged out and redirected to login page.

title: Data validation compliance with Indonesian financial standards
description: Verify that data such as currency formatting (Indonesian Rupiah) and tax ID (NPWP) adhere to local standards and that invalid data is rejected.

steps.description: Enter financial transactions with currency in formats other than Rupiah.
Verify validation rejects incorrect currency formats and prompts correct input.
Input NPWP tax IDs with invalid structure during vendor or company settings.
Ensure backend and frontend validation catches invalid NPWP format and prevents submission.

title: API endpoint security and role-based access enforcement
description: Validate that all API endpoints enforce authentication and authorization strictly according to user roles, preventing data leakage or unauthorized modifications.

steps.description: Attempt to call protected API endpoints without authentication token.
Verify the API rejects the request with 401 Unauthorized.
Call API endpoints with tokens belonging to users with insufficient permissions.
Verify access is forbidden (403) for operations not allowed by the role.
Perform normal API calls as authorized user.
Ensure requests succeed and return expected data.
